Articles.Content:
Sure, I'll put my hat in the ring. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*Best Educational Channel* - for - History of Spaceflight in RSS, Kerbal AMAs, tutorials, and more

*Best Showcase Channel* - for - huge intricate crafts, ISS replica series, and general attention to detail and realism

*Best KSP Channel Overall* - for - variety of videos, and even a

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ml8-xzjWS-8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Nominee: [{Bob Fitch}](https://www.youtube.com/user/BeazaYT)

As for video, let's go with

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SZeoHfONUxA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 as *Best Educational Video*

Doesn't really fit in to the categories listed, but:

Nominee: [DFWanderingKid](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQcnmxBroQuMf_0Hwk3Xqww)

Nominated for: Best Showcase Channel, Best Educational Channel

For his series "

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLdudzEyUcmvhcHo9597cDeF42_dWtIHWU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
"

I nominate katateochi's

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Tp6yj2k0Fpc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Mission for Best Showcase Video for demonstrating the cancelled Constellation Mission.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T02:17:00Z" title="04/20/2015 02:17  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by SDIR**
  
Wanted to change the category.
Hmf, if Kenny^3 can nominate himself, then I cast [*Maximus97*](https://www.youtube.com/user/Torg9776/videos)in for Best Upcoming Channel!

Alright, I think I've gotten everyone's requests. The only thing I didn't add was Danny2462 as an 'artistic channel' because those are supposed to be for cinematics and stuff, not silly and universe-breaking contraptions.

I'll pick this back up in the morning. Once again, thanks for all of the requests! I've already discovered a couple new channels to watch... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Upsilon

I would like to nominate [SWDennis](https://www.youtube.com/user/SWDennis) for best comedy channel, and their video

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/epQ246Se6YE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 for Best Comedy Video.
There needs to be a best series categoryÃ¢â‚¬Â¦in which Hatbat's Kethane station and Macey's Spirit of Kerbin should be in it

I nominate Tyler Raiz for Best KSP channel Overall. His videos and his missions rival Manleys in every way.

[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeHMXQRT6D3o2sbfsqkpCcA](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeHMXQRT6D3o2sbfsqkpCcA)

I was gonna nominate Tyler Raiz for Best Showcase Channel, but either way, more people should watch his channel.

Also, for Best Video overall, I would like to nominate: "KSP launching a plane to Mars with Real Solar System"

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TO7agmIq6AQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 It's based on a proposed NASA mission.[h=1][/h][h=1][/h]

> 
> 
> 
> Cool?

> 
> I was gonna nominate Tyler Raiz for Best Showcase Channel, but either way, more people should watch his channel.

Agreed, his channel is great! He has built some very cool rockets and I know that I have learned a bunch from him.

I nominate [https://m.youtube.com/user/SqueegyMackoy](https://m.youtube.com/user/SqueegyMackoy) SqueegyMackoy in the category best inactive Channel (although he is'nt really a KSP channel, he made my favourite series Kerbals at war). 

And I nominate the

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yxh9En_Rd6E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 Infernal Robotics Rework Trailer by Daz050571 for the best showcase Video.

I nominate katateochi's **Clubbing on Mun (MunStep)** in the categories **best artistic video** and **best showcase video**. In my opinion it fits both.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CENrhhXqjg0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I know it's a pretty old video but amazing! It's also the only KSP video I found worth bookmarking (and that's means a lot!).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T07:20:22Z" title="04/20/2015 07:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by \*Aqua\***

I wish there was another category for the nominations, I just don't know what it would be. Perhaps: "most impressive video"? I would love to nominate MrOverfloater for his fantastic work on SSTOs, but since none of the currently existing categories match well enough I'll say for "**Best Showcase Channel**" and his video

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bu8N2gHfWZQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T07:23:57Z" title="04/20/2015 07:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by hazard-ish**

I know how this may look, but I am going to go ahead and would like to throw my own channel [SHADOWZONE](https://www.youtube.com/user/krampfbein)in the pot for the "showcase" category (since Saturday I no longer qualify for the "up and coming" after reaching 500 subs).

> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gi6u3lSnZFo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Do you get the craft file for that trophy if you win?

> 
> I nominate Tyler Raiz for Best KSP channel Overall.
> [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeHMXQRT6D3o2sbfsqkpCcA](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeHMXQRT6D3o2sbfsqkpCcA)

Was going to nominate Tyler aswell but you beat me to it! Totally agree, his channel is full of a large variety of great content and just rocks. Would love to see him win this!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T08:27:01Z" title="04/20/2015 08:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by BevoLJ**

Best COMEDY CHANNEL,

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLD603D8234AE51EF0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T08:24:15Z" title="04/20/2015 08:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by roosterr**

I nominate Cupcake's channel [CupcakesLanders](https://www.youtube.com/user/CupcakesLanders) for best showcase channel. Because VTOL!![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I guess I'll nominate [WhyBeAre](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuPWP2zVJWjheu7K9DHlLNw) for Best Inactive Channel. Though he's active, he hasn't done a lot of KSP and he's kind of hilarious (though a little illiterate in the KSP sense.)

This is a great idea, by the way. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Best Comedy Channel: [Roninpawn](https://www.youtube.com/user/roninpawn/featured)

Best Inactive Channel: [Kurtjmac](https://www.youtube.com/user/kurtjmac/featured)(his channel is active but when it comes to KSP it is inactive, maybe a new category?)

Best Comedy Video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ggVh24ILq8k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

- - - Updated - - -

Best Up-and-Coming YouTuber: [Whackjob of KSP / SE](https://www.youtube.com/user/CrazyPilotEarl)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T11:07:09Z" title="04/20/2015 11:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by kookoo\_gr**

Nominee: [**Bob Fitch**](https://www.youtube.com/user/BeazaYT/featured)

For: *Best Overall KSP Channel & Best Educational Channel*

Reason: *Attention to detail, realism, time and effort put into all videos and great tutorials*

Best Educational video: 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZAumtIrXb8g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I enjoyed watching the videos nominated by others... so I thought I'd share a few of my personal favorites from the last couple of years. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm afraid I can't narrow it down to one nomination though, so if anyone else wants to nominate some of these great videos please go ahead! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
